Detailed Description

Detects various gestures and events using the supplied.

The OnPullDownRefreshGestureListener callback will notify users when a particular motion event has occurred.

 PullDownRefreshTest.h
 class PullDownRefreshTest: public gaia::core::Page,
       virtual public gaia::core::OnPullDownRefreshGestureListener,
       virtual public gaia::core::OnTouchListener {
    private:
       gaia::core::PullDownRefreshGestureDetector* mpDetector;
       gaia::ui::LinearController* mpCtrl;
       gaia::ui::LinearControllerParams* mpParams;
       gaia::core::Scene* mpScene;

    public:
       virtual void onInit(gaia::core::Persistence* const p);
       virtual void onTear();
       virtual bool onTouch(gaia::core::Widget* w, const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event);
       virtual void onBoundary(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event,
               float percentage);
       virtual void onFinish(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event);
       virtual void onCancel(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event);
       virtual void onScroll(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event,
               float percentage);
 }


 PullDownRefreshTest.cpp
 PullDownRefreshTest::onInit(gaia::core::Persistence* const p) {
     mpDetector = new gaia::core::PullDownRefreshGestureDetector(this);
     mpCtrl = new gaia::ui::LinearController(this);
     mpParams = new gaia::ui::LinearControllerParams(
           gaia::ui::ControllerParams::MATCH_PARENT, gaia::ui::ControllerParams::MATCH_PARENT);

     mpCtrl->setOnTouchListener(this);
     mpScene->attachController(mpCtrl);
     mpScene->setupSceneLayout();
 }

 bool PullDownRefreshTest::onTouch(gaia::ui::Widget* w, const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event) {
     return mpDetector->onTouchEvent(event);
 }

 void PullDownRefreshTest::onBoundary(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event,
      float percentage) {
 }

 void PullDownRefreshTest::onFinish(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event) {
 }

 void PullDownRefreshTest::onCancel(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event) {
 }

 void PullDownRefreshTest::onScroll(const gaia::core::MotionEvent& event,
      float percentage) {
 }

void gaia::core::PullDownRefreshGestureDetector::onConfigurationChanged ( const gaia::content::Configuration *  config)

Call this method to adjust pull down range based on the Action Bar's height in portrait/landscape mode.
